page.title: 10A WATER BAILIFF'S DAY 1
page.content: THE VERY NATURE OF THE WORK INVOLVED IN THIS JOB MAKES A SHORT DESCRIPTION VERY DIFFICULT BECAUSE OF THE DIFFERING SEASONS AND WEATHER CONDITIONS WITHIN THOSE SEASONS ,AND ALSO OPEN /CLOSED SEASON OF THE RIVER ITSELF.THEREFORE THE BEST WAY MY FATHER CAN DESCRIBE HIS JOB IS TO TELL YOU ABOUT TWO SEPARATE DAYS. A DAY DURING THE FISHING SEASON STARTS AT 08.00 ,AT WHICH TIME MY FATHER GETS A REPORT FROM THE NIGHT BAILIFF ABOUT THE PREVIOUS NIGHT'S ACTIVITIES.THE DAY'S WORK BEGINS WITH A PATROL OF THE RIVER AND A CLOSE INSPECTION OF ALL THE RIVER BANKS AND PATHS.ANY PERSON FISHING WOULD BE ASKED TO SHOW THEIR PERMIT AND HAVE THEIR TACKLE CHECKED.THE REMAINDER OF THE DAY WOULD BE TAKEN UP OBSERVING PEOPLE FISHING TO ENSURE PROPER METHODS OF FISHING.
